The reduced amount of caffeine means you don't get the crazy "holy crap I need to go lift a car RIGHT NOW" feeling the standard version gives you (Cellucor C4 Explosive Preworkout Supplement- 30 Servings -Mojito - G3 Chrome Series, for example).  Personally, I look forward to that feeling every morning when I step into the gym.  However, if you're a crossfitter or other workout type, that may not be what you're after, and in that case, this might be the pre-workout for you.The taste is pretty good, and I'm kind of a taste baby - if it's nasty, I'm not drinking it.  One thing to note is because of the creatine, you have to make sure you do a good job mixing it, or you're likely to get a mouthful of grainy bits.  Also, the amount of creatine contained in this isn't really enough to have the effect most lifters are after, so you're still going to have to keep taking another creatine supplement.If you haven't used a pre-workout before and want to know what it's like, this would be a good entry level product, as the usual side effects (that tingly feeling, increased heart rate) aren't an issue.  If you're all ridiculous with your workouts and want as much of a beastly boost as you can get, you should probably stick with the standard version or try the C4 50X.

If you have Monster High in your life, you know the need to collect dolls is almost more important than playing with them. My daughter is very concerned about having "that one" only to bring it home, unbox and place her in her stand to be admired.That made this a quick hit! 25 dolls can be placed in stands throughout the school. She loves putting her favorites in the themed rooms. The furniture is sparse but, all the other place sets work nicely. There is a ton of details on the walls, your little fan will be able to recall the movie and scene the set was from.This is not Fisher Price durable, so over 6 would be best. There are small parts like in all Monster High toys.It is big and impressive and it will take forever to put together. YOU MUST FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS, there is a big pile of plastic pieces that are not intuitive.

Okay, wow.I'm a bit of a bluetooth speaker aficionado, as I use them all the time for camping, pool time, park time with the kids, etc.  I have to say this is the most impressive speaker I've used so far.  It edges out some of the solid performers, such as the NYNE Multimedia Inc TT Portable Bluetooth Speaker (Black/RED/Silver) and the JBL Charge 2 Portable Bluetooth Speaker |- Black.The important things are all quality:- The sound performance is outstanding, with excellent bass response, and it gets loud without distortion.- The build quality is *solid*.  An aluminum reinforced housing makes it feel solid, and it survived several drops without a scratch.- You can accessorize it to make it perfectly suit whatever you're going to use it for, from a solar panel to a "glow deck" (which is a good way to light up your tent at night).- It supports pass-through charging, which means you can use the speaker, and use the USB port on the back to charge your phone.  With the solar panel option, you could technically have unlimited recharging power.- The battery life is substantial.  15 hours is the listed time, and it came very close to that, but we also had the volume close to the max most of the time.- It's waterproof.  I didn't test this functionality, but the housing is rubberized in all the right places.Some thing to consider:- Not all the accessories are available right now, presumably due to the popularity of the speaker.  I wanted to buy the solar panel, but it's out of stock with no availability date.- It doesn't come with a charger, only the micro USB cable to charge it.  This isn't necessarily a big deal, as I have more than a few USB chargers, but for someone that doesn't have them lying around, this could be a problem.That's really all I could find to nitpick.  I absolutely love this speaker, and we use it constantly.  It performs well, and takes a pretty good beating with no problems.  If you're looking for a good, rugged travel speaker, this is the one.

Nice snug fit, with all phone perimeter buttons protected but still functional. There are cut outs for camera/flash, charger, headphone jack and on/off switch-the perimeter speaker has 6 holes.The cover provides back, corner and side protection-as well as a "lip" over the phone face; helping to protect the face if dropped face flat. This case does not cover the majority of the face of the phone.It is easy to remove if needed. It is not heavy or bulky.Sides are slightly textured, while it is a harder plastic, it is not overly rigid.  There is a slight flex to the areas colored black, for grip and comfort. The white areas are a harder plastic, acting like a spine for the phone.I text with one hand often and the case design makes it easy to hold while my thumb is typing.

I purchased this set to replace the chrome handle I bought at The Art of Shaving store that had recently broken.  I spent *way* more on just a handle than this entire set.The set's badger hair brush is bona-fide badger and is quite pleasant to use. The razor handle is a tad bit short for my hands, but I'm kind of a bigger dude, so it may fit perfectly for someone else, but it still works very well for me.  Both the brush and the razor are very nice weights and definitely feel quality. The stand holds the entire shooting match easily and stylishly.I've only been using this for about a week, so I don't know if there will be issues with the chroming yet. I can tell you I'm super-happy with this as a replacement, especially since I thought I was going to have to go shell out some serious cash at The Art of Shaving store to replace my handle.If you're looking at this as a present for your guy - this is the one to get.  Just make sure you get him some shaving soap as well (nothing worse than having a new badger brush and no shaving soap to use with it).

I've had some experience with external microphones in the past, and I'm a pretty big fan of this one.  I've used lav mics with my DSLR for interviews previously, and the sound is good for voice, but pretty poor for anything else.  This mic solves that issue and has the added benefit of making your camera rig look pretty awesome, too (I know this isn't a "feature" of the mic, but all the same...).It's helpful if you're somewhat familiar with external condenser mics, as the instructions are 1. sparse and 2. full of technical jargon ("...the microphone uses its line-cardioid element exclusively to provide excellent off-axis rejection.").  The concept behind the mic isn't difficult to understand, however, so it's pretty easy to get up and running with it after fooling around a little bit.The 3.5mm jack is permanently attached to the mic, so that's one less cable to lose (note: make sure the camera you intend to use with this has an external mic jack - not all of them do).  It also comes with both a foam windscreen and fuzzy windscreen (which my daughter calls a "muppet"), which is a very nice add.I used the mic in mono mode to do an indoor interview and was *very* happy with the audio results.  Granted, this is about the best possible conditions for the mic, but the results show it's a quality piece of gear.  With the fuzzy windscreen on, it's still able to maintain very passable results outside and in a considerable wind.The rubber shock mounts on the mic kept any kind of motor noise (for example, the autofocus) from bleeding into the audio while I was using my DSLR.  This is something I've noticed with other external mic models, but is conspicuously absent from this one.Overall, it's a pretty great mic and a good piece of gear to have if you're even remotely serious about shooting video.

I originally was able to try this because I bought my wife the Zombie Gift Basket Set (http://www.amazon.com/Zombie-Cajun-Gourmet-Louisiana-Seasonings/dp/B00G6I14Y6/ref=sr_1_1?s=grocery&ie=UTF8&qid=1434987967&sr=1-1), and this was the least dangerous of the collection for me.  Because I'm a total spice baby.  Don't judge me.The closest thing I can compare this to is Frank's Red Hot sauce (Frank's is way more vinegary, just for reference), except this stuff is really, really delicious. Really.  It's more of a mildly spicy, garlic vinegar sauce that is so addictive, I can't eat pizza without it now.  As a matter of fact, I order pizza just so I have a good reason to get into the sauce.Even my wife, who is on a mission to find a sauce hot enough to melt her face, admitted this is really good.  It's been disappearing a bit faster than it should, so I think she's sneaking it when I'm not around.If you like the idea of hot sauce but don't have the tastebud fortitude for it, or you're just looking to add some awesome flavor to your food, get this.  Get it now.

As a competitive shooter, I have a wide array of hearing protection, from the simple foam inserts to $800 custom-fit ear canal protection.  I just seem to accumulate that kind of stuff, for some reason...That said, I didn't expect a lot from these earmuffs, considering the price.  For over-the-ear protection, I typically wear big, liquid-filled 3M Peltor uber-muffs, so I'm a bit spoiled when it comes to ear pro.  However, I was more than a little surprised when I unboxed these.I'm bald, so I'm super-picky when it comes to the fit of muffs, but these were really comfortable, and they don't give you the typical compression headache after wearing them for a few hours that some other muffs might (the Leight models come to mind).  They have a 3.5mm headphone jack so you can listen to music or whatever while you're using them - this is a feature that is usually reserved for the more expensive models.  The muffs are very solidly built, and don't feel cheap in any way.One small silly detail I really appreciate is there is a string attaching the battery door to the muffs.  When you're juggling things at the range, or especially in a competition, it can be a challenge to keep track of small parts, and having the door attached just makes things that much easier.  Again, a super-small detail that makes a difference, in my opinion.The muffs performed very well while shooting my .40 cal and .357 (both competition guns) - at least as well as my muffs that cost more than twice as much.  You can tell there is a top-end range of sound protection for these, however. I probably wouldn't recommend using these while zeroing your Barrett 50 cal, for example.  I saw another reviewer say he uses these with his black rifle, so I would think you could trust these up to at least a .223 / 5.56.If you're looking for a pair of really good muffs for a pretty exceptional price, I'd definitely recommend these without hesitation.

Quick read (under 175 pgs.) easy steps, applicable for leaders with a head count of 2 and up.As a multi-unit leader in retail, I am always looking at leadership tools to support and grow my team.This is not a quick culture impact like "Who moved my Cheese" or "Go Fish". This speaks to the leader and provides them guidance and validation to moving along a specific course to elevate the performance of their team.The steps are realistic and applicable to leaders, regardless of line of business. It is reflective and actionable, building the leaders strength in assessing, developing and hiring a team to support their goals.The book is written in a conversation narrative that I think will work well for my group so we can discuss together as we move through the chapters.I also love that is gives a comprehensive outline of "Who", the hiring strategy that this writing team built that spent so much time on the best seller list-for good reason!
None of the issues reported by others!Everything got and works with all of our Apple approved ( on the misc branded other) USB ports. Love the long cord!

This must be in your household cleaning arsenal.Best stain remover hands down. Blood, wine, mystery spot-takes care of it! Even old and set,Tho it does have a nice scent-stain treatment is its superpower!We have had success with clothing, carpets-you name it. We love it!(Not as magical on grease)

We actually used these as ice cream cups for our sundae bar.The lids are tough to remove-the secret is to squeeze the barrel and the top will pop!The lid is also high up so there is no seam for leaks.Note-straws are NOT included but the quality-even as a disposable ) you can wash and reuse)party favor was worth it.

We taped these to water bottles for our pool party-both boys and girls loved to "kiss the fish"! It was the favorite favor at the party!Not good for the dishwasher, but easier to wash than a crazy straw:)

First it is shaped like the sun, round center ( front and back) with the "rays" being flat. You only fill the ball part but, it easily took 2lbs of candy/prizes. It was sturdy so, I would suggest adding another lb of candy to make it a bit more primed to burst! We had 12 kiddos and everyone had fists full of treats.It arrived with a slight dent in the bubble part tho it was carefully packed-the dent easily popped back out once we filled it.

Exactly as pictured.The color is baby blue and everything is a soft flexible silicone.Twists to easily slip over device.Provides a slightly raised bumper to ensure face does not his the ground if dropped flat face-down.Not great for corner drops or far falls but cute novelty if you are low impact on your device.

I use these for making knives on a Kahn grinder, and they perform well.  They don't lose their abrasives very easily, even under heavy pressure with hard metals.  They're not exactly Norton belts, but they hold up very well, and the price makes them an easy choice to stock up on.

These are exactly as pictured.I have worn the same gold plated one for 6 weeks now and have not seen any change of color or quality.Check your measurements, these are VERY small. (Think slightly larger than the diameter of a spaghetti noodle)Since they are pronged they appear more sparkly.The post is a bit long, but I have never had it be a problem.I love the straight post, very easy to clean, looks better than a twist in my nose and I have never had it fall/pull out.

The waterproof feature of the speaker is top-notch, and it has survived several trips to the pool, where my kids promptly put it into heavy use by taking it into the water.  It then became a bit of a toy as they threw it back and forth to each other.  This hasn't affected the performance or functionality of the speaker one bit.  A single charge also lasts longer than we would need it to for a daily outing, and connecting multiple phones to it via Bluetooth was no problem whatsoever.That said...I just don't like it as much as it's non-waterproof brother (The NYNE Portable Bluetooth Speaker: http://www.amazon.com/NYNE-Multimedia-Inc-Portable-Bluetooth/dp/B00I9ID070/ref=sr_1_8?ie=UTF8&qid=1429031820&sr=8-8&keywords=nyne+speaker).  I understand the waterproof aspect of the speaker has a detrimental effect on the sound (even out of water), but I'm a total baby about how speakers perform.  This speaker sounds tinny, and has very little bass response.  Bluetooth speakers in general don't always have the best performance, but there are a few on the market - including the NYNE speaker I linked to above - that provide substantially better sound.If you're needing a speaker you can totally abuse for your outings to the pool, lake, etc, and you don't really care too much about the sound, then this should definitely be your go-to.  However, if you're an audio baby like I am, I would recommend going with it's big brother I linked above.

Pro's-Color-much brighter than the image seems, bright sporty yellow (think Yield sign), a coordinate, minimal pattern on the infant carrier head rest and sun cover (see pic-neutral, away from the traditional pink and blue and no baby animals!)-Material is an easy care nylon, most drips wipe off-Longevity; infant carrier includes car seat base for easy pop in/pop out of the car, carrier faces mom/dad and stroller is sturdy and large enough to get through toddler years-Infant seat is part of the Graco travel system and you can purchase additional bases for multiple cars-Padding is nice and comparable to higher end products-Overall light weight and folds pretty flat (see pic-less than 8" thick)-Good amount of storage in the under basket, both driver and rider have 2 drink holders and a deep tray for snacks or misc items like phone,keys, etc-Simple assembly-pop on breaks, wheels, and drink/food trays and ready to go!Con's-Stroller seat will tilt back but does not lay flat-It is not a one handed fold/unfold-1.Unhook the side safety lock. 2. Pull the thumb catch 3. Squeeze the release by the thumb catch 4.Use other hand to pull the stroller open (It is not as challenging as it reads-the thumb/release aspect is intuitive but, it took us a few tries before learning that we needed to use the other hand to release the stroller)-Large plastic wheels have a thin rubber cover and need to be locked forward for easiest fold but unlocked for easiest driving-Sporty look (the front wheels have cool yellow springs) but, cannot be a jogger-it doesn't really go off terrain that easily-grass is the most exotic terrain we were able to navigateTo note:-All of the material is a tech nylon, this has a very sporty feel-The infant carrier is made of the same nylon material, there are not soft plushy inserts to be close to soft little babies.(Why 4 stars, I wish I could do 4.5 stars-the unit is very nice and has all the right attributes but, the infant carrier feels a bit too industrial, yes it will be easy to care for but, I think the infant carrier should have had a softer material for the head support and strap covers)

Seat is very well padded, the fabric feels very nice like higher priced seats.Great care was taken to ensure every surface that comes in contact with baby is covered and padded.  The material seems to shrug off debris and liquids bead initially.  Most everything we spilled on it was able to be blotted off.  All that padding does mean lots of little cracks for crumbs but, it brushes out easily.The seat adjusts to the height of the child, it should be intuitive but we struggled and had to leaf through the bulky "how to book" to get it properly adjusted.The seat includes anchors, which is clearly better than using the seat belt.  Additionally, the seat belt weaves through the back of the seat, feels kind of scrappy. I appreciated the signage on the side of the seat showing where the seat should be positioned whether rear facing or forward with different angles based on the seat of your car.Works for infant through toddlers.The seat is a great value.

Nice set overall.Color is bright white, easily matches the open stock dishes from Crate & Barrel and Target to add to your collection.The porcelain is pure, I found no bumps or bubbles in the surface of any of the pieces in my set.Though the dishes are heavy, I found them to be a bit lighter weight/thinner towards the edges and worry of nicks in my future-note that I have not had any break or crack in our first 30 days together:)The mugs are very simple in style with broad-easy to grip handles. I like that they are microwave safe, nice to heat up tea and not sear off my fingerprints.I only gave 4 stars because the bowls were small (deep enough for soup but too narrow for much more than a small salad) and the edges of plates and bowls were a bit too thin.

The board size is good, feels like one we use at our favorite watering hole.Ready to use right out of the box, we did need the manual to help us navigate through the different games offered.Our family found other types of dart games-keeping is engaged in play, longer!We did destroy the darts on our first play. The tips broke upon pull out and when landing on the tile. The tip can be replaced but the plastic "wings" also snapped on impact.We bought new darts and all is well. The board had no problem scoring with the new sturdier darts.

This a memoir/how to from a man that is entrepreneurial and socially conscious.Told in a first person, Daniel shares with you both his fundamental concepts for building a healthy business and how he strives to leave a positive mark for the body and soul.Easy to read, he takes you through the 10 key "tenets" that he uses as filters and guides for his success. He shares how each has supported the growth of him and those around him.  Providing anecdotal stories to help the reader grasp the idea and how it has been a benefit.His actions are both selfish and seem altruistic if not for the financial rewards.I finished motivated by many of the ideas (especially the AND philosophy!).  I also find myself being more thoughtful in my buying choices, elevating my expectations of those I do business with.

We feed our 2 cats a diet of primarily wet food, as per our vet.  We also always have a bowl of dry food for snacking and keeping their teeth healthy.  We are consciousness of fillers but also know that they need something to "stick to their ribs" since the wet food seems to scream right through.Take a look at the label and make sure your kitty's agitation is not in the ingredients.  Fortunately, we think our kitty soft stools come from the richness of their wet food and having a bit more corn/wheat would give them a bit more dietary balance.We slowly added this to their previous food (Iam's kitten because we were looking for gentler formulas) and they did not turn up their nose and ate as normal.  As we continued to increase the Gentle to Iams ratio the girls did not boycott their dry snack--good sign.What I did notice in the first week was an improvement in their poo. (So nice we can share:)) The girls were having a more solid stool for the first time.  Not something that looked like it would be a challenge to pass but, a normal healthy deposit.We are on our 3rd week of trial and kitty's are happy and the litter box room is a bit more approachable.  This worked for our two.

If you love the pain of some crazy spicy sauce, this will deliver!The flavor is light, does not demonstrate the usual vinegar or heavy salt found in most. It delivers the heat without over powering the main course. It did a nice job of enhancing the food-making it hot and delicious with a slight smokey flavor.The spice is not a joke. The tip of my tongue was quite angry, the simple passing of my breath was painful for more than 5 mins after consuming.With ghost pepper I would add 2-6 drops on pizza or soup. This doesn't have a dropper, because of the chunky texture and seeds, so measuring is challenging. I definitely go lighter but don't shy away...it makes everything taste so much brighter!

My 2 girls started spraying on my sofa-these stopped the trouble instantly!I like these because they have shock and/or sound options. My whole family has taken a shock as we would move these on and off the sofa-it is bearable but unpleasant.We have a toddler so the sound option was great to ensure baby doesn't get a zap.My cats may have only taken a surprise 2 or 3 times. My cats don't even touch the sofa any more!Our batteries died rather quickly, 2-3 weeks. We were lazy and haven't replaced the batteries in more than 8 weeks. We keep the mat on the sofa and the kitty's stay away!Maybe soon I will get bold and remove them all together. These worked as great trainers!

Material is wonderful and flowy!They are long on my (5'7" with long legs), but the ankles are tighter so they don't drag the ground.My only complaint is that though I wear a size 8, these fit a bit tight and created an icky muffin top. They sit a bit high on the waist and I do not have a tiny waist, it's not the pants, it's me.They wash up nicely, moderate fading as expected with black.

This is a nice set. The set is a basic white duvet with 2 shams.The material is soft enough to be comfortable and thick enough to look like a bed cover. The screen is nice and washed easily without fading.The duvet was too big for our full down comforter but fit nicely on a queen. Pillow shams were also large for standard pillows. We did buy new pillows because our printed pillow was bold and could be seen through the sham.

LOVE these replacement cartridges!  They work flawlessly in our printer, and the ink quality is excellent.  No breaks or leaks, and the printer recognizes them without issues.  The price is right, as well - I'll be using these going forward.

I got these for my 7 year old, who is particularly hard on headphones.  She loves the way they look and sound, and she uses / used them continually.  They survived multiple road trips and smuggled trips to school, and put up with the abuse admirably. The headphones are definitely rugged and well-built - with one exception: the cord.  It pulled out where it meets the headphones within a week.  I did some dad-surgery on them and got them repaired, but had been a perpetual struggle until they finally separated for good about a week ago.It's entirely possible I got a bum set of headphones, but it's odd the manufacturer build the headphones like a tank and the cord like a Yugo.  Despite that flaw, I'd definitely recommend the headphones.
These have worked flawlessly in our printer, and the ink quality is outstanding.  No leaks, no problems - I'm definitely sticking with these going forward.  The price doesn't hurt, either. :)

I have some mixed feelings about this fan (mostly with the price), so I've gone with the pro / con approach:Pros:- The fan's grill is fine enough that it would be difficult for all but the smallest of fingers inside.- The build of the fan is very solid - not flimsy at all, so no rattling or odd noises.- The nightlight is located on top of the fan, and works very well without being too harsh at night.- Being able to lock out the controls is a very neat feature, and keeps the 1 year old we have in the house from changing the settings.Cons:- The price seems pretty high for a fan.  This isn't much different than any Vornado fan you could get anywhere.- The speaker on the fan is kind of tinny, and some of the sounds come out distorted.  The crickets sound great, however.Overall, this fan has worked really well for the 1 year old, and it's definitely substantially baby-proofed, which makes us feel a *lot* better about leaving it in his room.

Great product. Every home should have a safe for papers, money, firearms, etc.This is a nice size with great features-small holder in door (great for passports, spare keys, small jewelry box) a removable separate locking box (works as the only shelf) The safe is heavy, but not ridiculous for you to move and place securely in your home. Loved having it shipped to the front door!Check out the dimensions, "legal" size documents will not lay flat-standard papers will fit.Not shown well in the photo-this unit DOES have a digital key pad. Easy to set up to your own personal code. Also, there is an override key that disables the keypad so content access can be managed. Nice little unit for home use.

I have Berber carpet and this vac does a good job picking up debris and pet hair.What I found special about this unit was the wand. Transitioning from vac to specialty cleaner does not require difficult disassembly to use the cool, sturdy telescoping wand and accessories. Also, the suction power was not compromised.  The rotating head tool actually works and the other tool options are all cleverly tucked around the unit and easily accessible. If you like the light weight bagless sweeper concept, you'll love this one!

If you consider yourself to be a "professional" I would not get this unit. Let me explain.I, like many of you have made purchases over the years to increase the production value of my videos. Starting out small, and growing over time, increasing my investments into new gear. When I first decided that I wanted to steady my camera movements, I opted for an Opteka X Grip. I was limited by budget. Then I decided that I could invest just $250, so I bought this DVC Flycam 5000. I had a very difficult time getting the thing to balance properly.The thing about this type of rig, its for a run and gun type of video shooter. For weddings, music videos, and other similar types of work. I am constantly moving from one location to another. Each time I put the thing down, whether the camera was attached or not, the damn thing came out of balance. Meaning that I would have to spend 15-45 minutes getting it back into balance before being able to shoot again. This is a HUGE issue for me.The center post does not tighten down well enough to keep it from slipping from side to side. After just a few times using it, the coupler that holds the screw to tighten the up and down movement on the center post broke. I couldn't get it tight enough to hold, so it ended up breaking.I got fed up and sent it back for a replacement, thinking maybe it was just a faulty unit. I was wrong.After having issues with both units, I decided to up my game and invest in a Glidecam HD 2000 which was double the price, but far worth it. The adjustments were much easier, and the hardware was machined aluminum or steel, not plastic like the Flycam.I used the Glidecam for a few months, and decided to get a bit more crazy. I invested in a came-TV 7800 version which set me back about $1,500. At this point, far easier to adjust! It takes just 5 minutes, instead of 30. If you are willing to spend $250 on a Flycam, SAVE YOUR MONEY until you have enough to buy a Glidecam and you will not be sorry that you waited.

I've had many phone cases over the years. My main purpose of using a case is to give my phone some durability without sacrificing the look and feel of the phone. Let's face it, we all drop a phone from time to Time, phone cases are w worth while investment to protect your phone.I've had many cases for my phones, mostly I've used the Speck candy shell cases because of their rubber coating inside, and hard outer shell for complete security without covering the screen like so many otter box cases do.When I upgraded to the iPhone 6 plus I wanted the same kind of case, without making the overal footprint much larger than the phone itself, and without adding to the thickness too much.Due to the price., I was a bit hesitant in the beginning, but now after using the case for a few months, I love it. It adds a level of security similar to the other cases I've used in the past without adding a lot to the thickness.
Wonderful book.This book brings me back to my childhood and reminds me what Christmas used to be. Get your copy of the Collector's edition of this book https://vimeo.com/109180011
Love it, perfectly fits everything that I need for my Phantom 2

This lens is terrible..I bought this lens as an "all around" lens for what I do. I am a videographer, and I shoot a lot of weddings, commercials, and music videos. I needed a lens that would allow me to get up close, as get images far away from the subject. This lens worked well for a little while, but then it stopped working. I have actually been through two of these lenses. The next time around, I will be getting a different lens.First issue: I use this lens with my Canon 70D for video. Almost every time I am shooting video, seconds into shooting I hear a "click" then an error message pops up on the screen saying "please make sure the lens is attached" then it tells me to attach the lens and press the record button to continue. For a while I used the lens for still photos only, or to shoot B roll when my 18-55mm lens wouldn't cut it. I learned that I would never use this for a live event because it's not dependable. I eventually replaced the lens with the same lens, assuming that it was a defect.. not the case. The new lens does the same thing.At this point, I decided that I really still NEED the lens, but I would adapt my operations and only use it for stills or B roll. So I take it on a portrait shoot with a new client and I notice a spot in the image that was not going away. I cleaned the sensor, lens both the front and back side, and ended up finding out that there was a piece of dust under the glass. I got through the shoot, and decided to edit the spot out of all of my images which was a HUGE pain.. Then, the next time I went to use it, I saw what appeared to be a small hair in between two pieces of glass inside the lens.I am simply done with this lens... It is apparently not sealed very well.Others may have a different experience, but I can't trust this one to keep up with what I need it for.

I do LOVE this quick release plate.. my ONLY gripe is that the bottom does NOT mount flush. What the hell were they thinking?There is a small pin that locks the mechanism in place so the camera doesn't accidentally fall out of place, the housing for the pin protrudes below the flat surface of the bottom leaving this really odd bump on the back left corner making it not sit flush if you have the plate mounted to a monopod or tripod as I do most of the time. I have had to install 3 washers between the plate and the monopod or tripod to allow enough clearance for the little bump on the left back corner. Really annoying!Other than that, the mount is excellent. It's made of sturdy steel with a nice large tightening ring on the bottom that doesn't feel like it'll be going anywhere anytime soon like some other ones that I've used in the past.If you have to use a quick release plate, this is the one to get.. as long as you can adapt to your images not being level.

Easy to use, really straight forward and simple to setup. You don't have to "sync" anything (at least I didn't) with my Canon 70D.I use Neewer TT560 flashes off camera with my 70D and have never had an issue. The trigger works by screwing into the hot shoe slot on the top of your camera, the flashes get screwed into the hot shoe slots on top of the receivers in this kit and there ya go! No more setup required.I do wish the bottom shoe mount on the receivers were something more than they are, but for the price you can't complain. The bottoms are flimsy plastic, and I feel like they are going to break with a heavy flash mounted to them. I use cheaper flashes so it's not as bad as it could be if I was using a $500 flash and it dropped.

This battery grip is excellent.Keep in mind that I have never used a Canon branded battery grip, but I don't expect the Canon branded one to work any differently than this one.You get two battery trays, one for the Canon batteries, and a second for AA batteries. I recommend not using the AA batteries, unless you absolutely have no other option. The AA batteries die way too fast! I am a Videographer and use a Canon 70D for wedding videos, commercials, and promotional videos as well as music videos. This battery grip allows you to use 2 batteries at a time (if using regular Canon batteries) so you can literally double the usability time. For me, 2 batteries last 2-3 hours (for video) while running live view most of the time. I do turn off the camera when not in use, but it is on most of the time.The build quality is just fine, the buttons have a satisfying click to them. The only thing that I bring into question is the threads and housing on the bottom of the camera. I use this camera mostly on a tripod or monopod with a Manfrotto quick release tightly threaded into it. The bottom doesn't seem quite as sturdy as it could be, it could be that I am just overly worried about my camera falling off, but it has never done anything to suggest that it would.Overall, I would recommend this battery grip for anyone who needs to get more battery our of their camera for events where they don't have the time or ability to switch batteries constantly.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE this monopod.I bought this monopod to use to film weddings and other events. I love the versatility!The head is really nice and fluid, it is heavy which allows for smooth pans and tilts for even light cameras. I use a DSLR camera and it works splendidly.There is no need to get the Manfrotto monopod, save the money and get this guy. The ONLY down side is the twist legs, they are kind of obnoxious to have to adjust them especially when you are constantly changing heights and angles throughout a live event where things happen quickly. I ordered the flip lock version of this same monopod but got the order cancelled on me because they said they were no longer manufacturing it.This is the single most useful piece of gear in my arsenal.

They call this a field monitor.My definition of a  field monitor is not one that has to be plugged into a power source. I bought this without reading through the details as much as I should, only because I saw the words "field monitor" in the title.This item does not use battery power, you have to run a power cord to it.

Another great book from a brilliant mind! I have read other books from this author and have been greatly impressed by the unique writing and excellent plots. Once again, Erez Aharoni brings us a book that is more difficult to put down than the last. If you haven't read the any of the other books by this author, I would suggest to check out "Half a Moustache"  "The Eagle's Secret"  and "Wildfire".This man has some excellent international experience and it really shows in his writing. The characters really come to life. I love mystery and thrillers, this book brings those two genres together and makes you think you are in the story.Kidnapping is always a fear in the back of our minds as parents. Reading about kidnapping just hits home, it really makes you have feelings for these characters. Excellent read!

I am so glad I found this stuff!Since I was little, my dad was always warning me about the harmful chemicals and additives in deodorant. I took it for granted all these years, but recently started doing my own research and decided to try some natural products for myself.I stumbled upon this stuff and I am so glad that I did. It has a clean, natural scent that is pleasant. My wife was a bit hesitant at first, but how she is using it as well. I love that it has no harmful chemicals and is all natural. I wish more companies would care about that stuff.

First of all, I LOVE Amazon prime! Quick shipping so I can start using and enjoying all my purchases.My wife got me hooked on thick frothy bubbly milk, this frother makes the perfect frothy milk in a short amount of time.It is extremely easy to clean and to use. We use it for hot cocoa as well. The products you can make with this machine will blow your socks off! No more needing to run to the local coffee shop to get your fix, now you can get the coffee stand taste at home, or at the office without a huge mess.

1:02 MinsI bought this aerator after hearing from some people I work with how amazing it is. I love how it comes with the little travel pouch so it is easy to carry around and know that it won't get damaged.The box is sturdy, and really makes the product stand out.The product itself is made of an acrylic that is really built to last. It is thick and feels very durable. It is also very easy to unscrew and clean, that is very important.I poured wine into two glasses, one of them with aerated wine had a marking on the bottom of the glass so I could tell afterwards. I blindfolded myself and drank from both glasses. There was a very defined difference between the two glasses. I am impressed! It really lives up to its name, and is a superior product!
I loved this movie, excellent!The plot is very interesting. You always wonder about this sort of thing, but having a filmmaker follow a young girl through her life as a nudist was really intriguing.

I love this little guy!I recently attended a birthday for my little nephew. I was trying to decide what to get him. This frog in a box came up as a suggested toy, and I instantly fell in love with it! I love the jack in the box toy that I had as a child, I still have it around actually. After all the toys he got for his birthday, MINE is the one that he liked the most.

I love this product!I bought this set top box after a lot of research, and suggestions from friends. I have owned the Roku, but was very unimpressed with the layout of the menu, it was clunky and confusing. This set top box is also made as an Android unit, but has many more features, and is more user friendly than what I was used to.I love the menu layout, it is intuitive, and makes searching for an app to download, or apps you have already downloaded a breeze. The menu seems to be very content driven and was built with the end user in mind. I just wish my favorite app Aereo was still available on it!

I have used several different types of stakes in the past and have always found myself frustrated. Most stakes out there are just poorly designed.I love that these tent stakes are biodegradable, what a wonderful thing! They are much more durable than the typical stake you would find in just any hardware store. I just helped my neighbor put down some erosion blankets a while back, he used these stakes and was talking about how amazing they were.Most stakes I have used in the past have been made of a cheap plastic, most of which had the heads broken off before we got too far into the project, rendering them basically useless. I liked the stakes so much, I decided to order some for myself and my own yard. I also ordered some extra to use as tent stakes.

I loved this book!I struggled with girls all growing up, I never thought I was good enough for anyone. I had several women that I thought I was in love with, but I was always too chicken to take them out. I wish I would have found this book 15 years ago. This book is an excellent guide.This book is much more than just a dating guide. It goes in depth and helps you understand yourself, and women, and how to go out and get the woman that you deserve, not the one that you think you have a fair shot with.

My name is Katy, I thought I'd add my two cents for those of you considering buying this product. Baladea was recommended to me by two friends who raved about it, so I decided to try it. I have to say I’m absolutely amazed with the quality of these DVDs and my results. I have been able to lose 18 pounds in 4 weeks and feel great! I have tried several other workouts and diets in the past but they never really worked for me. The included guide explains what this product does differently: It combines new fitness exercises for calorie burning with wellness exercises for stress reduction. Together wellness and fitness help your body to better release stored fat for faster weight-loss. It really seems to work, I’ve have followed the program as recommended and my weight keeps dropping :) Ok, some other thoughts in random order: First of all, finally a workout system that’s specifically for women. Thank you Holly Perkins! Also, I want to add that it’s great to have so many different DVDs included. Every workout feels new and it the program doesn’t get boring. So overall this is a great product that actually works and I really, really like it. Highly recommended!-Katy

I am a huge fan of thrillers of any type. I get sucked into books like this. If you've ever watched the TV show 24, you know the kind of "sucked in" that I mean. It takes you down roads that you didn't think were possible. You think you understand what is going on, just to find twist after twist. What seems to be such an innocent love in the beginning makes you think twice about who you can trust.If you're a fan of 24, Blacklist, or any type of thriller similar to those, you will LOVE this book.Once you pick it up, you won't want to put it down. Seriously.

I love these cookie cutters. My little boys used to love making cookies with me period, now they want to help more than ever. I love that there are a variety of cookie cutters, not just one or two. They are sturdy, and fun. I will be using these for easter cookies for years to come!

I have an rental apartment that has all electric heat, and I pay the utilities on the place I was looking for Four things for a new thermostat Digital Thermostat, 1 a thermostat that can handle 14-16 Amps, #2 has a long warranty # 3 temperature lock on it, so my tenant does not crank the heat to 80 degrees and #4 was easy to install very happy with this digital thermostat

I am sort of new to kickstarted, but after seeing this product I knew I had to get involved! I have seen this sort of thing "leaked" in the media a few times over the last couple years, but I hadn't seen one until this one. I used to LOVE my gameboy. I have owned a PSP recently, and I use my phone on a daily basis for games while I am waiting for the train, or sitting in traffic. Nothing has really gotten me excited until I got this in my hands.It's like xbox/playstation type gameplay in the palm of your hands. No awkward buttons on the screen that you can't seem to keep your fingers on. This is the real deal! It feels nice and stable, not rickety like you might think. I am almost bought a  MOGA controller, but I am glad that I waited.

I got this spiralizer as a gift from a friend recently and just LOVE it! I used it one night as a way to introduce some veggies into my home made spaghetti without my kids knowing. I have used it for zucchini, carrot, and cucumber. It is much easier than trying to cut by hand, and leaves less of a mess. Cleanup is a breeze too, I usually use my vegetable sprayer to clean off the blades, but occasionally little bits of veggie get caught in the blade, all you have to do is use your kitchen brush and it comes clean very easily.I just bought one for a friend for a wedding gift. This is a must have for any home, especially homes with children.

I have been using this stuff for some time daily as part of my normal diet. I used to be over weight, and I would eat fast food at least one to two meals per day. I have made some substantial improvements to my daily routine, including a breakfast and lunch veggie smoothie.I heard about this Jamaican Cacao Butter through a coworker and decided that I had to give it a try. After using it for about a week or so, I noticed a significant change in my overall brain functionality. I was able to think more clearly. I have more energy, I feel like I am on top of the world! It is amazing how different I feel.All too often, we neglect our brains. We may go to the gym and work out our bodies, but our brain needs exercise too. I have used it as a body butter as well, it is a delight!

Bought the book for around $10, but the info included could have saved me thousands in architect fees. Really this author describes how to make your own plan on your own land and do so with a budget it mind. I highly recomend this book.

I loved this book, it is packed with adventure. It combines exciting writing that separate it from the typical action adventure. I love fast moving novels, I need something that will suck me in and not let me go, this book does just that!There is a nice mix of action, adventure, fantasy, and of course horror. The book will really walks the line between what is reality and fiction. The soldiers are at war in a land where they can trust nobody. They are watching their backs more than ever before, and with the “beast” taking the lives of soldiers, humans aren’t the only ones feared.This is a “sit on the edge of your seat” thriller that will leave you begging for more!

I bought this mattress as an extra bed for when guests come over. I got tired of the cheap mattresses that simply don't last. We have used this one about 20 times and it still holds up as well as it did the first day. I love the convenience of the internal pump.

Given the relatively low price of this charger, and its ability to charge smartphones and tablets, it's a great device to have on hand if you live in an area with extended power outages. For me, it's been a good investment.

I purchased the product several months ago from their website. The foam is seriously amazing. Losing your hair at any age, for any reason is a very emotional experience. I had a friend recommend this product to me. I was skeptical, and still a little in denial. I saw a difference in my hair in about a month, I am now regrowing my own hair. I swear it is thicker than I ever remember it being. I now have my life back!I also love that the product is chemical free, natural, and doesn't have any nasty smells. Always a plus.

I love the unique plot. It didn’t take too long before I was sucked in, I had a very hard time putting down the book. I got the book for my son, but ended up liking it as much or more than he did.I have written short stories a lot over the years, and it takes a tremendous amount of work to think of something original and fun to read. The imagination of the author is awesome. The book is fascinating, and intriguing. I love a book that has characters that you can relate to. Excellent read for kids and adults.

I LOVE LOVE LOVE these pot holders. They are comfortable to wear, and effective.These oven mitts have replaced all of the cloth mitts that I used to have in my kitchen drawer. They are excellent for use on my BBQ grill, smoker, and with my dutch ovens which I use ALL the time in competition. The oven mitts I used to use for catering would get nasty and dirty because they always got in the way. People would look at me grossed out because they were always stained and dirty. These ones, if they get dirty, I simply rinse them off and sanitize if needs be and move along with the task at hand. No need to throw them in the wash, they are easy to clean.I will be buying these as gifts for everyone in my family this year for Christmas.

There is a very noticeable difference with this product. I am 31 and have noticed an endurance issue increasing over the last few years. I used to be able to run for miles without much effort, now I run for a couple minutes and I am our of energy.My exercise schedule has taken a hit because I simply haven't had the endurance to push through like I used to. After using the product, I feel like my sex drive has increased ten fold, and I feel like I have more energy for working out which is always good. I feel more happy and satisfied with life, I think my kids have noticed the changes too. They don't get as many excuses as to why I won't do things with them.

These arrived quick, and work great! I had a family kilt handed down to me, but it was way too small. The Extend-a-kilt added the length I needed, with room to spare. I tried another kind of kilt extender that had extra buckles on them, but they were uncomfortable and I thought they looked funny. These are easy to put on, and they don’t stick out like the other ones. I am very happy with this brand.

I have always struggled with acne. It was difficult in school, but you assume that as you get older, the acne will start to go away. That was not the case with me. Especially when it comes to summertime when I spend a good portion of my time outdoors, the acne only gets worse.I am a HUGE fan of natural remedies. Most things in life can be "cured" or remedied with natural products. After finding NextSkin, my faith in natural remedies is only further proven. Acai is a great, antioxidant rich berry that grows in rich rain forests and has been known by locals for many generations for its healthful qualities. The "super food" acai berry really does work wonders for your skin!I know it sounds weird, but after using this product I have more energy, my acne is gone, and I just feel better. There are no harmful nasty chemicals, smells, or eye irritants that you find with traditional acne treatments.

This book is an excellent thriller with plenty of twists and surprises. I was quite surprised when the "bad guy" was revealed. The book is full of mysterious characters, and the plot is downright intriguing. It keeps you wanting to read more. A few times, I sat down with the intention of reading one chapter, but got sucked into it so much that I ended up reading much more than I anticipated. It is a book that I just couldn't put down.The author has a great gif for storytelling that makes it an interesting read, and the chapters segue very well one to another. You will NOT be sorry that you spent the whopping $0.99 and the time to read this MUST READ book!

I bought this for my twins as they started to learn to read. For work, I travel a lot in the car with my little ones. It didn’t take me long to realize that they needed something to do while in the back seat during the day. I wasn’t about to just let them just watch brainless movies from the mainstream. I prefer that since we are in the car for 3-4 hours a day my kids watch something educational.I bought this Tiny Tutor Sight Words as a way for my kids to get more out of the time that we are in the truck. They love it! I basically have it memorized since it plays constantly. I bought a set for my sister in law for her son, and plan on doing the same for all little ones as they come of age in our family. They really get a LOT out of this DVD set.

Over the years, we tend to abuse our hair, and face without realizing it. As we get older, many of us start hunting for products to undo the years of abuse. Too many products don't live up to the hype.After using this product, my hair looks much more healthy. It is much more rich and natural looking, without having to color it as much. Argan Oil is an excellent way to rejuvenate your skin and hair to a more youthful appearance. It is not thick and greasy and nasty as lotion, and the bottle is compact enough that you can take it with you anywhere. I take it with me when I travel, just apply a few drops and you're done. No disgusting residue. It absorbs very quickly.

I have struggled to take the pounds off that slowly packed on over the years. I have tried several "diets" but have failed miserably.The hardest part of any diet is the feeling that you are always hungry. I have been using this pill for a few months now and absolutely LOVE it. I have been losing weight, and inches which are most important. I don't feel hungry, ever!Dr. Oz featured Yacon root a while back. "Yacon, a South American root which has been part of the Andean diet for hundreds of years, may be the next big thing to promote healthy weight loss" When I watched the show, I could't hold back so I ordered some and have not looked back!Excellent product, and very affordable for a 2 month supply.

For the last 15 years I have been addicted to Mountain Dew. I have tried to quit many times, but have failed miserably with every attempt.I was absolutely flabbergasted at how effective this product worked! I didn't have the nasty caffeine headaches like I did in my past attempts. I used to drink 100+ ounces of Mountain Dew every day, no kidding. No water at all. And I wondered why I gained so much weight over the years. I was drinking my calories. Now that I am no longer addicted, I drink water 99% of the time, and I feel great! I have lost some weight in the process, as a byproduct. I now have more energy. I have even been inspired to join a Gym and get back down to my high school weight once and for all.If you are looking to rid yourself of your addiction to caffeine, this product really does work! I love that I have the ability to order it here on Amazon with their outstanding customer support, and they offer a 100% money back guarantee! How can you go wrong? Do it! Take control of your life TODAY!

I love this product. I have used some other Big Mike's fitness products and have loved them, so when I found this I knew I had to give it a try. It is easy and painless to install, and easier to use.You can easily pull it down in seconds in the event that you don't have a door that you can leave it on all the time. It rests securely on the door frame and feels very sturdy.The build quality is nice and it is comfortable to use. That is where the comfort ends!If you struggle to get to the gym, or if like me later on in the day after visiting the gym, you itch for an extra little burn, you can easily do some chin ups with this bar.You can also pull it down and use it for push ups which are always great, easy, and very effective. If you spend your money on one piece of fitness equipment, get this one. It offers multiple workouts with one purchase.You can get an upper body workout in just a few minutes a day.Having this thing hanging from the door you look at every day makes it a constant reminder that you need to work out. That makes it much more difficult to make excuses for why you shouldn't get to the gym. Make it a regular thing, and you will absolutely feel the difference!

Push ups are so simple, and yet so effective in so many ways. This product takes push ups to a whole new level that help to isolate muscles in your arms, back, and chest.You feel it in different ways than you feel a typical push up, so you may have to work into it slowly and increase reps over time.The product feels sturdy, and the handles are very comfortable. Very simple and effective product that is a must for any home fitness routine.If your abs struggle a bit to remain firm, you will also feel the burn a little bit as I do.They are small and easy to store, so you don't have to find a corner for them, they take up about as much room as a pair of slippers.

I used to have one of these a few years back, but I stopped using it because I "got too busy".Over the last few years, I have slowly seen my mid section go from toned to flab. My trainer recommended that I start using this ab slider in addition to my regular crunches, and here we are about 6 weeks later and i definitely notice a difference! This machine engages muscles that are simply left out with traditional crunches or situps.You feel it in your arms, back, and abs. It is a very effective and inexpensive machine to add to your home workout routine.There is no setup, it is simple and straight forward to use.If you are using it for the first time, start off slow, and ease yourself into it. Increase the amount of time that you use the machine week over week and  you WILL see results!

This ab wheel is so simplistic and yet so effective. It incorporates movement with an already effective planking stance.Crunches are simply not enough.My personal trainer recommended that I get one of these after not seeing the result that I was working so hard to achieve with traditional crunches. You can really feel the muscles working intensely, which feels great!This product works for someone who might just be starting a workout routine, and for those who are already very active. It engages muscles otherwise left out with other traditional ab exercises. For the price, you can't beat it!

I HATE Valentine's day, so I didn't buy my wife anything. We went out for dinner, but nothing else. Maybe I'm a terrible husband, but I think I should be able to express my love to my wife on any occasion that I wish.That being said, I found these roses and decided to order them at random and have them delivered to my wife while she was at work. When I got off the phone with her. She was in tears. She kept asking how they kept them alive in a box, I had to remind her 3 times that they were fake!Now that I have seen them with my own eyes, I know why she thought they were real.They are insanely long! You think 30", but when you actually get the package you realize how long 30" really is. I had to look a couple times to make sure they really were fake, no joke.Beautifully crafted, long stem roses. The red is stunning, and will go perfect in our living room.If you are on the fence about this product, get it. They're even better than described.

Finally spring time is here! Or at least it was until earlier today, now it is snowing..Now that my 3 little ones are 4, and 5, I am realizing how great it is for my kids to play outside. At the first sight of sun, my boys started begging to go outside, but after a few days they seemed to get sick of the sand box. When I found this swing set, I ordered it as a surprise for my twins' birthday and set it up when their friends came over to play. Much to my amazement, two weeks later, they are still playing on it every day as much as they can.Swing sets seemed so overrated to me until now. They love it, and I love the free time to fold laundry, vacuum, and wash dishes..The swing set itself is made of durable steel, and comes with all hardware and instructions necessary to set it up. You can choose to cement it in the ground permanently, or leave it above ground as I did so it can be moved if you want to. The price is very reasonable for what you get!Overall, I love it, the kids love it and that's what matters!

I have always struggled to find a pair of jeans that fit the way I wanted them to. Most pants are either too thick in the thigh, or too narrow at the leg opening.I stumbled upon these Pure Style jeans and have found a new favorite pair of jeans! I also love that I got them while they were on sale, so I thought I would write a review so other people out there know what to expect.I dig the coloring, the light wash is a nice touch. They fir just right on the hips, carefully designed to fit snug on the thigh, but leave plenty of room with the flared leg opening.The stitching is top notch, with nothing left to be desired. The material itself is perfect, not too thick, but not too thin. You can tell they took special care when designing these jeans. I generally spend months looking for one pair of jeans, when I found these ones, I bought myself a few pair. When you find something you love, stick with it right? By far my favorite jeans that I have ever bought!

This book is just fantastic. I can't say that I am enlightened now but I am having strange 'AHA!' moments that are taking me to a deeper level of understanding than ever before. Fingers crossed it leads to full awakening soon!

I love to spend as much time outdoors as I can. We spend a lot of time outdoors hiking, biking, and camping. While enjoying outdoor activities, it is important to remain hydrated.Over the years I have tried various water filters, but have always been slilghtly frustrated with every one in one way or another. Filtration systems are always bulky and awkward. When I found the blackhills waterstraw, I got excited! After using it on a day trip for myself, I had to get one for everyone in my family. It is an easy addition to any pack without adding any weight, or unwanted bulk. It is easy to use because all you have to do is drink out of the straw. Also nice, you can get 1,000 Liters of use out of it, so you spend the money once, and don't have to spend it again for a long time!This is a MUST HAVE for any outdoor enthusiast.

My parents didn't win any prizes in the way they taught us about money. There are too many people walking the streets complaining about money woes. As a society, we have been trained poorly. The principles taught in this book are common knowledge for the people that are wealthy, but the rest of us are out here in the universe trying to piece it all together. Life is a test, and we all know how horribly tests turn out if you don't study right.This book offers lots of data that will help you start changing the direction of your financial future today. I am glad that I took the time to read this book the first time, but each time I have read it since, I have gotten more out of it.

I originally downloaded this for my 3 little boys to play while we are out and about, they love it! I can't tell who uses it more, me or them. It is a fun game for the kids, even the one still inside of each of us grownups.

My wife and I for about 3 years struggled to connect. We were literally on the verge of divorce, a few times she would actually go to her mother's house for days at a time. We spent thousands of dollars at multiple therapists trying to track down the root of our problems. It wasn't until I got this book that I finally realized that our problem was.With social media being an every day thing for most people in the world, it's no wonder that we have the problems that we do. Too many couples give up before they actually tried to figure out what their problems are.We have learned some techniques with this book that have helped us deal with our internet addiction. It started simple with leaving our phones in the car while at dinner, then moving the computers out of our bedroom.I am proud to say that we are now happier than we have ever been. Happier than we were even before we got married! I was able to fall in love with my wife again because we have enough time for each other. The internet is a tool, and it should be used properly. This book is excellent! Well written, with some intriguing topics that will make you really think.The truth is, everybody needs to read this book!

Pedersen does a wonderful job of explaining why India is the way it is and how it got that way. She also does a nice job discussing social problems, putting them in perspective, and talking about solutions underway. A must read for visitors but also good for those interested in travel, culture, politics and history. She's funny and the pages fly by.

I have written poetry since I was in grade school. I love poetry. Over the years I have read many poetry books. Some are ok, others are pretty good. This one was different than most. I love the enlightening, uplifting feeling that you get while reading her work.Just when you think poetry is dead, Karen writes this marvelous book with lots of uplifting pieces of art so carefully crafted to make your day brighter!

For years I have used several diets that simply went nowhere. When I was younger, I worked jobs that required me to lift heavy weight all day long so I was always fit. After a while, I started damaging my back so I got myself a desk job. The sad thing is that I didn't change my eating habits. It used to be that I could eat anything that I wanted, and still maintain my fitness level because I was literally burning thousands of calories daily. When I got my desk job, I didn't change my eating habits, and I never questioned it. I always knew that I was gaining weight, but I never knew how bad it was until I hopped on the scale and saw 300 pounds.I knew that I needed to do something! I did some research, a LOT of research. I had to literally re-learn how to eat. I know that sounds ridiculous, but as humans, we are trained wrong. The food guide pyramid is just wrong. We need more veggies, more fruits, less carbs, and some healthy fats. This book literally changed my life! By implementing the strategies found in this book, I am down 22 pounds in about 3 months.I am not saying that you will lose 22 pounds in 3 months, you may lose more, or less. What it comes down is your discipline, which I used to have none of.It's NOT about dieting. That word needs to be stricken from the dictionary. You need to never diet again! It's about adopting a healthy lifestyle that will help you lose weight, give you more energy than you ever thought possible, without going hungry!

For work, I travel a lot. I spend a lot of time on layover in airports, in hotel rooms, and coffee shops. It seems that I am always in a hurry. I always have my laptop with me so I can be as productive as I can be while not in the office. I have tried multiple laptop stands over the years, and none of them really made it "comfortable" to work while on the road.My wife bought this Fishhook laptop stand for my birthday and I am simply amazed at how versatile it is! It is nice and sturdy, plus with the open back design, it allows your laptop to ventilate so it doesn't overheat. I have had my computers shut down many times over the years because they overheated while sitting on my lap, or another laptop stand.Maybe it's just me, but it seems like I can sit up straighter because of the design. It really is ergonomic!  It should fit most any laptop. If you travel, or for whatever reason are on your laptop while on the go, this one is for you!They work on your knees, on your office table and pretty much any hard flat surface. They fit snugly in your existing laptop bags and are very easy to carry

I travel a lot for work and I am often in airports on layover, waiting for the Valet or sitting on a plane. For me, having a tablet at the ready is a must, whether it be to check the weather, stocks, or read a good book. I used to lug around a few books in my briefcase and for so long, I accepted that as the norm. Now that I have my tablet, I am always looking for “the next good book” that will carry me through the day.One day I stumbled upon Best Kindle Free Books and haven’t looked back! I love love LOVE a good read, but not having to pay for it? Come on! I am always finding little gems. Some I read once and don’t get back to, others I have read a few times. Having access to lots of books while on the go is very convenient, all in one place. No need to spend money on a book just to find out that it wasn’t what you thought. All in all, I would be willing to spend a few bucks on this app, but I’ll take FREE!

Don’t let the title fool you! It’s not just for the Jewish, I am Christian and I have found this book to be enlightening and motivating. I work with a gentleman who speaks of Kaballah quite often and he always seems to be positive. I kept asking him how he stays so positive even through tough times.For a birthday present, he gave me The Secret of Jewish Coaching: Based on Kabbalah and Jewish Wisdom and I have loved it! I am finding my own happiness after putting to practice some of the techniques that this book discussed. I have gone back and read it a few more times, and each time I learn something more.

"adventure" is right!This book offers it all! I have never read a book like this. The thing is, women want to be "hunted" or pursued, as men, we love the hunt. This book offers a funny insight to "the hunt". You will learn some things that will surprise you. I enjoyed the advice, and as the previous reviewer stated, it will give you an extra boost of self confidence!I always struggled with "how do i pursue" a woman that I want? How do you pursue without being desperate, or over the top? When you ask a woman out, you put it all on the line, and we do it in public. I've been turned down before, and it is absolutely embarrassing. Women don't know how easy they have it!This book gives guidance as to what to do, and how to do it. How to walk up to a Brunette (or any woman) and not make a fool of yourself. I am a divorcee, and it is difficult enough to get back out in the dating world after being married for so many years, this book gave me the boost that I needed to do it right, and have a better chance of getting the women I really wanted to date.

Excellent, durable protection.  We have several OtterBox defender products in our household for iPhones and iPads. A phone actually survived, without a scratch, being thrown across the room and getting wedged into the dry wall *ahem, teenagers*.
Really nice quality athletic shirt. Kid approved; cool webbing design on the sides. Worn and washed several times with no visible wear.

Nice tinted BB cream; light and blends well. It has subtle coverage and left a semi matte finish on my skin which I love. I did not however care for the scent; why cosmetic companies put fragrance in their products is a mystery to me. I would recommend this product except for the price. I feel there are plenty of drug store alternatives for less.

Works as advertised; another product to add the an anti identity theft arsenal. Its hard to imagine someone looking through my garbage for bank/credit card statements/offers but you never know. With the piles of mail we get at our home, this would be handy to use on that sensitive material. It just irritates me that now I have another job to do instead of just recycling all that paper. What is this world coming to?

It's hard to imagine that this is the same the author of wonderful books like Lord of Fire and Lord of Ice.  I hate to be mean spirited but this book and the preceding novella are just terrible. I purchased them because I thought Foley was going back to the style of her Knight's Family Series. Not so. This historical romance not only has an unredeemable man-whore hero and a complete idiot for a heroine but literally overflows with contemporary dialogue.  Too bad. Another previously auto-buy author bites the dust.To digress-It seems that my list keeps getting smaller and smaller.  Gone is Mary Jo Putney, Julia Quinn,and  now Foley.  I have mixed feelings over Madeline Hunter and Eloisa James.  Elizabeth Hoyt is very good and Mary Balogh is excellent. I wish Joanna Bourne would write another book and am hoping against hope that Cold Hearted Rake by Lisa Kleypas is excellent. If anyone has author recommendations, please leave in comments.
Nice neutral grey matte. I would describe it as a mushroom color. If you don't like the matte, you can simply add a clear top coat and viola! shiny!

Nice oil, delicate scent. After a good conditioning, I use it on damp hair and a drop, if needed, for some extra shine on dry hair. I think I prefer the Keratase oil to this one but it is  a good and less expensive alternative.

I was looking for a larger portable bluetooth speaker and this one fits the bill; cannot compare with smaller palm sized speakers. I am not an audiophile but I think the sound is fantastic. highly recommended.

I'm not an audiofile so take my review with a grain of salt. There is no comparison with Bose over the ear headphones, then again they are not $300. The 808's have pretty good sound quality and adequate noise cancellation. For the price, they are decent. What bugged me is that they are heavy and much more bulkier than they need to be.  Sitting with these on for hours is not comfortable or fun.  A cheaper alternative but I guess you get what you pay for.

Excellent kitchen bags. A definite improvement on Kirkland brand bags. The stretch makes a big difference in the amount you can fit in the bag and, so far, none of the bags have torn.  The scent is nice too, not overpowering. I would recommend these bags if they were the same or similar price to the Kirklands.

Nice treat. I was surprised how well this works. It did reduce the *look* of my mom's fine lines and wrinkles albeit only temporarily. She looked nice and dewy (moisturized) right after. I would recommend this as a treat since it is pricey, maybe before a big event.

Our family has been using packing cube sets for years.  Everyone has their own color, makes it super easy to access things without making a mess in your suitcase/bag.  Small one for underwear & socks, medium for rolled shirts and large for pants and thick sweaters. Would not travel without these, and they are washable too!
Pretty dainty set. The pendant is more durable than I imagined at this price point and the bracelet is adorable. A really nice set for a pre teen.

Runs true to size: hubby wears a large and it fit perfectly. The material is best described as in between swim trunks and running shorts. They are very light and fast drying. He really like the vents near the waist.
Nice middle-of-the-road conditioner; not too heavy and not to light conditioning for normal hair. Smooths my fly aways well. I would recommend a deeper conditioner for dry and/or thicker hair.

Love this credit card keeper. Keeps them nice, organized, and secured with the snap. I was hoping however that it could replace my wallet and hold bills in the side zipper. Unfortunately the side zipper pocket is not wide enough for bills. I have to fold them oddly or risk ripping them when unzipping (which I have done several times).  That is extremely annoying.  Too bad, it would have been perfect otherwise.
I have been using this grilling thermometer for about a month. I'm impressed with its ease of use, just set it and forget it.  No more worries over undercooked chicken or over cooked steak.

Apparently a mouse pad does make a difference in gaming, or so I'm told by my teenager who I got this for. The sleek almost silk? like surface allows him to move the mouse quicker/accurately.  Bonus points for mom.

Nice looking leather case but I wouldn't count on this keeping my iPhone protected. The there are two glaring problems with this case 1)  While it does cover the corners, it does not cover the top edge of the phone, making it vulnerable to damage and 2) it does not feel secure in the case, as if it could come off easily (does not wrap enough around the edges IMHO).  Basically you are buying it for the good looks and the nice leather. I'm sticking with my cheap Caseology cover.

I used this cable organizer to keep my Mac Air charging cable from tangling. Anyone familiar with the Mac Air knows that it comes with a charging cable that can be separated into two parts, after about a year of use I noticed the thinner cable was cracking a one point. I put some white electrical tape on it and put this 2x sleeves (one is too short) over it. It works well; keeping the cable straight.

Good as a general concealer but a bit drying for the under eye area. I'm 40 years old and I have fine lines under my eye area, this concealer accentuates them. I've had more success with the NARS concealer for that area.

Good food processor for the average cook. This won't replace my Vitamix or Kitchenaid Mixer but definitely gets most jobs done. Its a bit noisy but that is expected and I was a little disappointed that it only has 2 power levels besides pulse.  Nice and sleek looking. I also like the suction cups which hold the processor firmly to the countertop while in use. Another nice feature is that the processor will not turn on until the lid is engaged.Comes with-knife blade(only a single level)dough bladethick slicing/coarse grating discthin slicing/fine grating discextra fine grater discspatula

It you have dandruff, this stuff is worth a try. Worked well for my teenage son  who had a massive, I'm talking major flakes here, case of dandruff.  The trick is that you can't forget to let the lather sit on your head for a few minutes before rinsing. I would definitely notice some flakes if he did a quick lazy wash.

I tried this one and the Olay in-shower lotion.  Both were great except Olay is very heavily scented, while Nivea is mild. I took my time to really work this into my skin before the rinse; I think that made all the difference.  Super smooth and hydrated after. I recommend using Dove Moisturizing Body Wash before hand.  Great combo.

Very nice light scented body wash. Creamy and lathers well. Used in combination with the Nivea Body In-Shower Nourishing Lotion for Very Dry Skin = super soft hydrated skin. No need for body lotion afterwards.

Similar to other wireless speakers within this price range.  Sound is nothing spectacular but the touch controls are a nice bonus, as well as the very compact size (fits in a bag easily).  I recommend saving up for the small Bose wireless speaker instead, the sound quality is so much better.
I decided to get these after noticing that my son's soccer club uses them during drills to improve foot work.  They are sturdy and lightweight. Easy to pop in the trunk and bring to the field.

I've been using Lancome's Genifique Youth Activating Concentrate for years and its my opinion that this Olay product is a pretty good duplicate.  Both serums work to exfoliate dead skin cells and reveal a "more youthful" layer.  Makes my skin nice and smooth in the morning, love it. Olay is a bit thicker than Lancome but thats the only dissimilarity as far as I can tell; even the self loading dropper is the similar.
